sentences.sContent: He undertook to finish the job by Wednesday.
sentences.sContent_eng: He undertook to finish the job by Wednesday.
sentences.sCn: 他答应在星期三以前完成这项工作。

sentences.sContent: They have to vacate their offices before Wednesday.
sentences.sContent_eng: They have to vacate their offices before Wednesday.
sentences.sCn: 他们必须在星期三以前将办公室腾出来。

sentences.sContent: The foreign guests will call on you next Wednesday afternoon.
sentences.sContent_eng: The foreign guests will call on you next Wednesday afternoon.
sentences.sCn: 外宾将在下周星期三下午拜访你。

phrases.pCn: [基督教]圣灰星期三（复活节前的第七个星期三）

trans.tranOther: the day between Tuesday and Thursday
